transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good morning sir.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Sir, Shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART se, Anjali mam ne call kiya.
Executive: Sir actually kal aapki na baat hui thi Anjali se, theek hai? Haan. To aapne bataya tha ki aapne aapne jisse bhi service li thi, aap unse ek baar discuss karna chahte hai service ke uske baad hi koi. Kya hoga aadmi ne mere ko paanch mahine pehle plan liya, chaar mahine pehle aake shakal hi nahi dikhai.
Customer: Bhilwada mein local bande aake connect nahi kar pa raha hai.
Customer: Bahut achcha pehle wo har teesre din aata tha mere paas ki bhaiya plan le lo, plan le lo, 25/12 jab maine plan liya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To aap abhi ye chah rahe hai ki wo aapse milne aaye sir meeting karne ke liye?
Customer: Kabhi nahi aaya na, uske baad na samjhane aaya na kuch, keval paise liye aur ravanna. Aadmi ne shakal hi nahi dikhai, na koi call, na kuch ki buylead aayegi, tumko call aayenge, aaj din tak kuch nahi.
Executive: Achcha okay, matlab to aapne isse bataya nahi tha na unko proper kaise kya service kaam karti hai saari cheeze ya matlab.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: To matlab matlab aapko proper bataya nahi tha ki service kaise kya kaam karti hai IndiaMART ki kaise kaise.
Customer: Zero, zero, kuch bhi nahi.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Okay. To ek kaam kar do sir. Pehle to usne aisa kaam karti hai par usne baad mein wapas aake usne kaha bhaiya main aaunga aapko har saat din mein samjhaunga aapko buyleads aayegi, purchasing bhi jayegi, calls aayegi.
Executive: Achcha aapko ye bola tha usne.
Customer: Okay, usne aapne ko ye bola ki main aaunga aur ye bhi leads vagarah apne aap aayegi automatic aayegi na ye bola aapko na?
Customer: Usne kaha tha ye har saat din ki aapke saath hai har saat din mein iski calls aayegi.
Executive: Okay, har saat din mein kitni calls aayegi?
Customer: [inaudible] buyers ke calls kaha hai?
Executive: To dekhiye, wohi discuss karne ke liye actually kal Anjali ne phone kiya tha kya hota hai na sir hamara jo service hai calls vagarah vaise aa to rahi hai lekin bahut jyada nahi aa raha, theek hai sir? Pure teen chaar jaise matlab pichle mahine mein bhi ek ya do call aaya aapke paas, theek hai sir? Kyunki hamara jo service hai hum jyada use nahi kar rahe, theek hai na? To kya hota hai jaise aapne service li hai sir us service ke hisab se ek listing banta hai hamara ki jo hamare product mein deal kar rahe hai competitor alag alag, theek hai sir? To jab us product ko search karega to jo log supplier dekhenge uske baad buyers usko phone karte hai sir, theek hai na? To wo listing kya hota hai ki jaise maan lo aapko jo buylead hoti hai to buylead.
Customer: [inaudible] mere ko main aapka itna badhiya catalog banaunga, aapki itni badi profile banaunga, saat din mein profile bana saala 500 photo load kare. Uske baad mein banda na to photo load karne aaya. Paanch photo load the maine jab bina paise ke wahi mere load ho rakhe the.
Executive: Okay, to matlab aapke aur bhi products hai jo ispe keh rahe hai aap load upload nahi hai na sir?
Customer: Kaha hai? Agle ne catalog banane ki baat ki thi aise catalog banta hai ki paanch photo load karke?
Executive: Nahi nahi samajh gaya sir aap ye keh rahe hai dekhiye main ye pooch raha hu sir aapse dekhiye main bhi aapki help karne ke liye bol raha hu aapke abhi aur product ispe aap cha rahe hai aur add ho ispe kyunki abhi pure product add nahi hue na 14 product main dekh raha hu add dikha raha hai aapko ispe sirf only na sir aapke.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aur usme se kai product aapne jo dale the usme se kuch aapke. [inaudible] nahi aata hai na, to sir bolta hai main to aapki itni badhiya website type ka bana dunga main aapko ki aapka banda khelte ek minute mein aapke saare product click ho jayenge. Bande ne paanch photo load kare uske baad mein aake shakal hi nahi dikhai.
Customer: Bande ne kaha tha ki aapka jo ye ye jo bina paise dene wale sabse neeche aayenge paise dene wale sabse upar aayenge.
Customer: Aapne paid plan liya ye to mera free plan hi dikha raha tha. Maine free kya 33000 kharch kare.
Executive: Samajh gaya matlab aapko ye unhone bola ki jo paid wale honge upar aayenge baki free wale honge to wo. [inaudible]
Customer: Wo sir bilkul hota hai. Matlab paid wale hi upar aate hai lekin paid mein bhi do teen tarike ki category hoti hai ki kaun service ke liye paid kar raha hai, theek hai sir? Higher service hoti hai, medium hoti hai aur aapka basic hota hai sir, theek hai na?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Wo depend karta hai, theek hai. Mera mera mera request suniye.
Customer: Jo service jo pehle plan bechne ke pehle aakar banda 40 baar usne meri meeting code karo 40 baar meeting karne aaya hoga plan bechne ke pehle.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur plan bechne ke baad mein zero visiting hai, zero meeting hai. Code dalta hai aapka to har meeting pe check kar lo aap.
Executive: Ji ji haa hoti thi bilkul sir hoti thi OCP daal ke hi wo meeting hoti thi bilkul sir.
Customer: Haan, haan to agle ka aapke yaha registered hota hoga ki itni meeting kari agle ne?
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir bilkul sab wo hota hai pura data rehta hai. Sir aap check karwana ki kaise kya feedback hai IndiaMART ka. Phone karke aap.
Customer: [inaudible] 10 baje ka calling time hota hai feedback karne wala. Jab vyapari aadmi hai 10 se paanch maine kal bhi kaha tha madam ko ki mera calling time teen se paanch dal do.
Executive: Hmm hmm main samajh gaya Badal Soni sath main dekh raha hu Sajid aur Badal ke sath abhi kai baar meeting hui hai, theek hai? Hmm. To wo main main dekh raha hu uske main July mein aapke July mein. [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible] calling ka time hota hai kya subah subah aadmi kaam karta hai bank ke kaam karte hai 10 baje ka aapko kaam karke aadmi aadha aadha ghanta call kar sakta hai kya 10 baje to bataiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi dekhiye main actually call kiya tha kyunki kya hua tha na abhi kal baat hui thi to aapke paas ek feedback ke liye aaya tha to feedback aaya tha hamare paas.
Customer: [inaudible] call aata hai maine do baar negative feedback dala jab 10 baar aadmi ne call kiya baki kisi ko matlab nahi.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir dekhiye hamari team aapko sir. Sir aapko ek hum dedicated account manager assign karte hai hamesha aapka jo app hai na IndiaMART app agar hai aapke paas usme uska naam number sab rehta hai hamesha aap kabhi bhi connect kar sakte hai usse number hum hamesha rehta hai aapka par wohi hota hai ki aapko. Dekhiye pehle sabse pehle jo local banda hai na aapke jo unko bhejo ki unko bhaiya pehle. Dekhiye sir actually main main samajh gaya sir dekhiye wo hote hai main theek hai main check kar lunga unse kyunki dekhiye kya hota hai wo sales wali team hoti hai servicing part pura head office se manage hota hai.
Customer: Haan, pura dekhiye actually main samajh gaya tha aapki baat ko. [inaudible] aap se baat bhi nahi kar paunga. Ek minute number mera time time schedule dal do 3 baje ke baad mein aapko call back karega theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir main baat karta hu. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Did not receive promised service after payment.

- Local representative not connecting properly.

- Catalog not created as promised.

- Wants calling time to be changed.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues and promised to investigate.

- Assured customer of dedicated account manager.

- Promised a callback after 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check with the sales team.

- Executive will schedule a callback after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, catalog, calling time, buyleads, subscription
